articles.title: Scientists prepare CERN collider restart in hunt for "dark matter" - Reuters.com
articles.description: Scientists at Europe's physics research centre will this week fire up the 27 kilometer-long Large Hadron Collider (LHC), the machine that found the Higgs boson particle, after a shutdown for maintenance and upgrades was prolonged by COVID-19 delays.
articles.content: PREVESSIN, France, April 20 (Reuters) - Scientists at Europe's physics research centre will this week fire up the 27 kilometer-long Large Hadron Collider (LHC), the machine that found the Higgs boson… [+2075 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Puzzling outbreak of liver disease in kids spreads outside Britain - 9News
articles.description: Health officials say they have detected more cases of a mysterious liver disease in children that was first identified in Britain, with new infections spreading to Europe and the US.

articles.title: Lexus shows off RZ electric crossover ahead of global debut - Automotive News Europe
articles.description: Lexus' first BEV appears similar in size to the bZ4X, the Toyota brand's first EV designed from the ground up.
